intro: Lodicularia protensa, commonly known as the red spider lily, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. It is characterized by its striking red flowers and sword-shaped leaves. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and wetlands. It produces small, dark berries that contain the seeds. Lodicularia protensa is a perennial herb that thrives in humid climates and is often found in swampy areas.
